Desc.entry: Group exercise classes which are based on having fun and making friends whilst keeping fit. Led by professional instructors the classes provide a good all over workout. Offers a range of classes to suit everyone from traditional aerobics to modern classes such as boxercise. Also runs women only classes.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10.30-11.30am (beginners yoga), 11.30am-12.30pm (core stability), 12.30-1.30pm (aerobics), 5.30-6.30pm (step), 7.15-8.15pm (yoga), Tues 10.30-11.30am( beginners pilates), 11.30am-1pm (improvers pilates), 6-7pm (boxercise), 7.15-8.15pm (absolute abs), 8.15-9.15pm (aerobics), Wed 10.15-10.55am (aquafit), 11-11.45am (women only aquafit), 1-2pm (cardiac circuit), 2-3pm (tai chi), 6-7pm & 7.15-8.15pm (weight management classes), Fri 10.30-11.30am (chair earobics), Sat 9.30-10.30am (cardio workout), 10.30-11.30am (fitball), 11.30am-12.30pm (aerobics)
